text: Let A, B, and C be disjoint subsets of the sample space. For each one of the following statements, determine whether it is true or false. Note: "False" means "not guaranteed to be true." a)P(A)+P(A°)+P(B)=P(AUA°UB) v b P(4)+P(B)<1 v P(A°)+P(B)<1 v dP(AUBUC)>P(AUB) v
